mapper.update: update l_casualtiestype set casualtiestypeid=casualtiestypeid ,casualtiestypecode=#{casualtiestypecode} ,casualtiestypename=#{casualtiestypename} where casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid}

update l_casualtiestype set casualtiestypeid=casualtiestypeid ,casualtiestypecode=#{casualtiestypecode} ,casualtiestypename=#{casualtiestypename} where 1=1 and casualtiestypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and casualtiestypeid =#{Where_Id} and casualtiestypeid=#{Where_casualtiestypeid} and casualtiestypecode=#{Where_casualtiestypecode} and casualtiestypename=#{Where_casualtiestypename}
mapper.select: select t.casualtiestypeid "casualtiestypeid", t.casualtiestypecode "casualtiestypecode", t.casualtiestypename "casualtiestypename" from l_casualtiestype t where casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid}

select t.casualtiestypeid "casualtiestypeid", t.casualtiestypecode "casualtiestypecode", t.casualtiestypename "casualtiestypename" from l_casualtiestype t where 1=1 and t.casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid} and t.casualtiestypecode=#{casualtiestypecode} and t.casualtiestypename=#{casualtiestypename}

select t.casualtiestypeid "casualtiestypeid", t.casualtiestypecode "casualtiestypecode", t.casualtiestypename "casualtiestypename" from l_casualtiestype t where 1=1 and t.casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid} and t.casualtiestypecode=#{casualtiestypecode} and t.casualtiestypename=#{casualtiestypename}
mapper.delete: delete from l_casualtiestype where 1=1 and casualtiestypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and casualtiestypeid =#{Where_Id} and casualtiestypeid=#{Where_casualtiestypeid} and casualtiestypecode=#{Where_casualtiestypecode} and casualtiestypename=#{Where_casualtiestypename}
mapper.select: select t.casualtiestypeid "casualtiestypeid", t.casualtiestypecode "casualtiestypecode", t.casualtiestypename "casualtiestypename" from l_casualtiestype t where 1=1 and t.casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid} and t.casualtiestypecode=#{casualtiestypecode} and t.casualtiestypename=#{casualtiestypename}

select count(*) from l_casualtiestype t where 1=1 and t.casualtiestypeid=#{casualtiestypeid} and t.casualtiestypeid!=#{NoId} and t.casualtiestypecode=#{casualtiestypecode} and t.casualtiestypename=#{casualtiestypename}
